name: Citizen Problem Reporter (Esri Australia Hub)
description: A solution to solicit non-emergency problem reports from the general public (e.g., blight, graffiti, trash, potholes, clogged drains, flooding). Reports are location-enabled and help organizations efficiently triage and resolve issues. Commonly implemented by planning departments, public works agencies, utilities, and local governments for asset maintenance or code enforcement.
owner_name: Esri Australia (as host on ArcGIS Hub)
